full_summary:
**Request for Supply Arrangement: Establishing Service Agreements for Supplying Educational Research Services**
=====================================================================================================

**Government Contracting Entity**
------------------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

• Name: April Charron
• Email: <april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Tender Details**
------------------

• Tender Reference Number: WS3678357791
• Publication Date: September 23, 2022
• Tender Closing Date: November 4, 2022 at 2:00 PM EST
• Expected Contract Start Date: October 31, 2022
• Expected Contract End Date: None

**Tender Overview**
------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a Service Agreement from qualified contractors to provide educational research services in the field of teaching and educational research. The tender is a request for supply arrangement and will be awarded through selective tendering.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria**
--------------------------------------

Eligible contractors must be capable of providing high-quality educational research services and must adhere to the requirements outlined in the tender document. The evaluation criteria will include variations or combinations of the above methods.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and complies with the requirements and provisions outlined in the agreement.

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

Canada

**Contracting Entity Address**
-----------------------------

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
